metadata.title: CVE-2013-4558 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The get_parent_resource function in repos.c in mod_dav_svn Apache HTTPDserver module in Subversion 1.7.11 through 1.7.13 and 1.8.1 through 1.8.4,when built with assertions enabled and SVNAutoversioning is enabled, allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and Apacheprocess abort) via a non-canonical URL in a request, as demonstrated usinga trailing /.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4558` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-svn - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
libapache2-svn - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
libsvn-java - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
libsvn-perl - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
libsvn-ruby1.8 - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
libsvn1 - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
python-subversion - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
ruby-svn - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
subversion - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
subversion-tools - 1.8.8-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: subversion package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.8-1ubuntu3').
